General.Name: Digital Graphics Incorporation
General.Description: Digital Graphics Incorporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides digital inkjet printing solutions worldwide. It offers textile, sign, and graphics printers used in outdoor advertising, solvent banners, car rapping; and food printers for desserts, rice, and bakery products. Digital Graphics Incorporation was founded in 1985 and is based in Yangju, South Korea.

3.Name: Shin-Yong  Yoon
3.Title: Chief of Technical Research Center and Director
